title: Wicked Deceit
description: My enemy is The Apocalypse Society: Three brothers, a hidden agenda, distorted masks, and minions who do their dirty work.They tried to kill the rabbit.They injured two of the men I love.They thought they could cut me down.Not only my life, but the lives of my four men, are now in danger.Time is running out. The rabbit is almost in their trap. The next time they may succeed in killing me. Or worse, someone I love.This fight is life or death. I will get the answers I crave, or I’ll burn every obstacle in my way to the ground.I won’t go down without a fight. I’m Kaycee f*cking Cole, I’m stronger than they give me credit for.Things are about to get wicked.*Wicked Deceit is book 3 of 3.* Wicked Deceit is a full-length, mature/dark/contemporary/new adult/ bully romance/full of mystery, spicy scenes, and foul language. It is recommended for 18+ readers.*WD is a reverse harem novel, meaning the FMC has more than one love interest. FMMMM* Please read the author's note at the beginning of the book before proceeding.
author: Aly Beck
